title: Jennifer Lopez and Owen Wilson wrangle a bulldog on the set of new film Marry Me
text:
Can someone give Owen a hand with this dog please? (Picture: Splash News)

Jennifer Lopez and Owen Wilson have been spotted filming for their new movie Marry Me in Brooklyn, New York, and the pair of them appeared to be wrestling with their furry co-star.

The actors were seen walking a bulldog as they filmed scenes for the new film, with Owen picking up the pooch at one point – and it looks like the pup was a little on the heavy side…

While Owen’s latest Marry Me costume was a dressed down ensemble of checked shirt, jacket, jeans and trainers (ideal for dog-wrangling), Jen was decked out in a much more dressy outfit.

She was seen wearing leather shorts (which she pulled a pair of grey trackie bottoms over to keep her warm between takes), a white shirt and heeled boots paired with a long coat and a bandana over her ponytail.

The film sees Jen take on the role of a pop superstar who gets jilted by her rock star fiancé after she finds out he is cheating on her with her assistant the night before she is due to walk down the aisle for their wedding at Madison Square Garden, so she ends up marrying a random man from the crowd instead.

The romcom, based on Barry Cosby’s graphic novel of the same name, will also star Jameela Jamil, Sarah Silverman and Maluma, and is being shot in New York.

More images from the set leaked last week, seeing Jennifer wearing an extravagant beaded wedding dress with a matching veil and fur stole as she stepped out of a taxi.

A passer by was more interested in the pup than the two A-listers on the other end of the lead (Picture: Splash News)

Jen pulled a pair of tracksuit bottoms over her leather shorts while Owen struggled with the pooch (Picture: Splash News)

Jennifer’s outfit slayed yet again (Picture: Splash News)

Jennifer, 50, is also preparing to walk down the aisle in real life next year, as the Hustlers star is due to wed her fiancé Alex Rodriguez, 44, in 2020.

The singer and actor revealed she has yet to do much planning for the big day, telling Entertainment Tonight: ‘We’re talking about it, but we don’t have any firm plans… and we’re talking about a lot of places [to get married in], but I don’t know yet.’

Jennifer has been married three times in the past, first to Ojani Noa from 1997 until 1998, then Cris Judd from 2001 until 2003 and to Marc Anthony from 2004 until 2014.

She was also engaged to Ben Affleck, although the couple called off their wedding a day before the ceremony was set to take place and split up the following year.
